fields.name: delay
fields.description: The field for the delay record component.

fields.name: period
fields.description: The field for the period record component.

fields.name: title
fields.description: The field for the title record component.

fields.name: message
fields.description: The field for the message record component.

constructors.name: Notification
constructors.description: Creates an instance of a Notification record class.

methods.name: toString
methods.description: Returns a string representation of this record class. The representation contains the name of the class, followed by the name and value of each of the record components.

methods.name: hashCode
methods.description: Returns a hash code value for this object. The value is derived from the hash code of each of the record components.

methods.name: equals
methods.description: Indicates whether some other object is "equal to" this one. The objects are equal if the other object is of the same class and if all the record components are equal. Reference components are compared with Objects::equals(Object,Object) ; primitive components are compared with '=='.

methods.name: delay
methods.description: Returns the value of the delay record component.

methods.name: period
methods.description: Returns the value of the period record component.

methods.name: title
methods.description: Returns the value of the title record component.

methods.name: message
methods.description: Returns the value of the message record component.
